page.title: 15THE WEEKLY SHOPPING
page.content: When we look at{trading}in this area, stretching from the inner city to the residential suburbs, we do not see the giant stores or hypermarkets found in the urban fringe. The majority of trading is done through small shops, mainly for daily or weekly uses, lined along two of the major routeways, Govan road and Paisley Road West. There are also some large supermarkets along P.R.W, and there is a new {shopping centre}at Govan Cross, accessible by Underground as well as car and bus. The Co-Op owns this centre, and also have a major wholesale distribution centre at Sheildhall in the north west corner of the area.
